activities: Datanational Corporation collects personal information voluntarily provided by individuals interested in our products and services via online automated form submission.  This personal information collected from our website (www.datanat.com) is strictly used internally to respond to requests for product and service information and is not shared externally with any other entity.  In addition, Datanational provides IT Solutions to our clients which may include their internal ERP Application Systems, some with outward facing eBusiness solutions which may or may not collect personal or confidential company information.  Our client information is secured within their hosted application system and is not shared by Datanational Corporation outside of the organizations which collected the personal or confidential company information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: organizational and client data submitted electronically
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
